description: Note: Make Sure your music volume is set to 100% and your phone is not on vibrate.  Belch N Burp for webOS is the premier belch app for WebOS. Belch N Burp includes 21 real belch/burp recordings. Pick and play any of them from our master list or play a joke on somebody by setting the timer.  Need a random burp, hit the random button. You can also select the raunch button in the lower right to get one nasty wave of sound. This app is based on our original HomeBrew application GassPasser (PreBrewFarts) which has seen over 40K downloads to date.
